content: a long tail for sewing light yellow yarn fig 17 don t stuff the ears fig 16 4 chain 1 2 half_double_crochet in this loop fig 18 3 half_double_crochet in next *insert your hook from back to front 7 loops fig 19 through the space between the single fasten_off crochet stitches yarn over complete the single_crochet as usual 17 see the short video in my channel on youtube https //www youtube com/watch v=holv35fadyy& t=9s 20 18 21 19 22 shoes make 2 use light blue 173 yarn chain 5 stitches are worked around both sides of the foundation chain round 1 start in second chain from the hook 23 increase in this stitch 2 single_crochet 3 single_crochet in last st continue on the other side of the foundation chain 3 single_crochet slip_stitch in first st 10 round 2 chain 1 2 increase 2 single_crochet 3 increase 2 single_crochet increase slip_stitch in first st 16 round 3 chain 1 single_crochet increase x2 2 single_crochet single_crochet increase x3 3 single_crochet increase slip_stitch in first st fig 20 22 24 round 4 chain 1 single_crochet* in the space using the post of stitch between stitches join with slip_stitch in first st fig 21 22 23 24 22 5 round 5-6 chain 1 22 single_crochet slip_stitch in first st 22 2 legs make 2 rounds use cream 130 yarn round 7 chain 1 8 single_crochet 5 decrease 4 single_crochet slip_stitch in first st attach the cream yarn to the first back loop 17 of round 9 round 8 chain 1 7 single_crochet 3 decrease 4 single_crochet change the chain 1 make a single_crochet in this stitch place your yarn to light yellow slip_stitch in first st 14 stitch marker here it will be the first st of round 9 chain 1 flo use only front loops the leg crochet single_crochet in next 13 st 14 increase x14 fig 25 28 round 1 chain 1 single_crochet in each back loops of round invisible fasten_off fig 26 27 28 9 slip_stitch in first st 14 stuff the shoes firmly round 2-4 chain 1 14 single_crochet slip_stitch in first st 14 cut the yarn leave a long tail for sewing 25 fasten_off stuff the legs firmly fig 29 30 29 26 30 27 tail use cream 130 yarn round 1 8 single_crochet in magic_ring 8 round 2-16 single_crochet around 8 15 rounds 28 stuff the tail lightly cut the yarn leave a tail for sewing fig 31 31 6 assembly from eyes and eyebrow - 2 stitches length and 1 stitch height fig 37 38 sew the ears to head between rounds 4 and 14 fig 32 the bottom of ear should be 36 sewn 5 stitches from the eye on the left and on the right and 2 stitches up fig 33 the top of ears should be sewn 12 st between fig 34 32 37 33 38 2 st 5 st sew the body to the head using the light 34 blue yarn the opening
